website_summaries.verdict: This large plush toy makes adults giggle with glee and young kids feel like they're fighting the dark side.
pros: It's as big as a 2-year-old and that's worth geeking out about
Good construction and stitching, making it durable enough for young children
Great size for kids who like to sleep with a stuffed toy
cons: If Kylo Ren isn't one of your favorites, this toy isn't for you

customer_reviews.title: Best of all:  You can finally punch him for what he did to his Dad
customer_reviews.text: Add a little Dark Side to your life with this super awesome plush Kylo Ren! You saw him in The Force Awakens - he was all full of angst and bitter. Maybe he just needed a hug? Well, NOW IS YOUR CHANCE TO SEE. This IS the Commander of the First Order that you are looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Simer

customer_reviews.title: The cuddliest dark side warrior!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love him. Kylo Ren is one of my favorite characters so having this relatively big, snuggly version of him is amazing. Very leggy, definitely taller than I was expecting, but in a good way. Only thing was that mine came with a head twisted slightly to the right, but I don't mind since it adds character--kinda always looks like he's giving an offended glance, haha. I have a Vader plush too, and Kylo is enjoying some great bonding time with Grandpa, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Fun Pillow Buddy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one as a gift and then one for myself. The doll is soft and the detail is surprisingly good. Currently, since it is summer, my Kylo doll is hanging out in a kid's pool ring as a decoration on my sofa table. I move him around. He's my Kylo Ren in the Den, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Kylo is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love it, he’s really soft, and bigger than I thought. I got it like 2 after I ordered it with free shipping, real fast shipping. It came in a big box with a lot of paper- it low key scared me to death cause it looked like a literal child faced down in the box, I made my mom take it out cause yeah I was spooked lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect gift for young Star Wars fans
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see how big it is. My 4 year old son is really in Star Wars right now and his favorite character is Kylo Ren so when I found this at this price I had to pick it up for Christmas. He sleeps with it, throws it around and even wrestled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Davison

customer_reviews.title: Great doll
customer_reviews.text: My child loves her new Kylo Ren. He is arrived exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mi Stone

customer_reviews.title: Kylo ftw
customer_reviews.text: It’s Kylo. I mean what more do you need? I sleep with it every night. Lol —- I mean my kid does.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Adorable item!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a grown up Star Wars fan (Kylo Ren is one of my favorites!) and this is probably the most awesome thing I’ve ever bought myself! Haha! It’s detailed but also very plush. Makes a great sofa neck pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son was turning 7 & OBSESSED with Kylo Ren! Although I did look through the lil ones with the blankets, the really didn't seem worth it. I like the look of this guy. He is a good size & soft. He ABSOLUTELY Loved It! Now I got the perfect pillow buddy!
customer_reviews.author: Happyb (CD)

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift
customer_reviews.text: i was surprised how big he actually is! It's about the size of a small toddler lol! But I love this kylo ren! And my sister who I got this gift for loved it too! It has brought lots of laughs from guests and we even gave him his own chair.
customer_reviews.author: Pupchild

customer_reviews.title: I'll show you the dark side 🥰
customer_reviews.text: So huggable. Best stuffie EVER. Even better...I get to snuggle with Kylo every night 🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka h.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided to go for it anyway. The size is larger than expected. The fabric and craftsmanship are exceptional. My grandson was very happy Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Can’t wait to give this to my nephew! At the age of 4 he loves everything Star Wars, especially Kylo Ren so when I saw it I HAD to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Master of the Knights of Ren
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought, which was delightful. A must for every Kylo Ren fan. Come to the dark side with this Master of the Knights of Ren. Was delivered even during the snow storm in the US. To the door.
customer_reviews.author: Tej

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE BABY
customer_reviews.text: He is bigger than I expected! And I love it for that! Details are amazing, soft fabric too, enough fill to cuddle.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cuddly villain
customer_reviews.text: This Kylo Ren is big, soft and very huggable. The fabric is really nice to hold, and the size makes this a great snuggling companion.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthann O. Adamsky

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived fast and nicely packed! The plush is huge and cuddly! Definitely a good night's sleep!
customer_reviews.author: LH Ong

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who lives Kylo. He was bigger than I expected which was nice. Very good price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME.
customer_reviews.text: Love him. (Both Kylo and the pillowbuddy!) It's a great product - Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Additional pillow on my bed for puppy to lie his sleepy head on rather than hogging my pillow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which was a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this. Taller than I thought, which was a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Kylo Ren. Soft and cuddly and just the right size for him!
customer_reviews.author: Osterparty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for snuggling for child and adult
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Perfect for snuggling for child and adult. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: PremiumSaltine

customer_reviews.title: Come to the Dark Side; we have cookies and cuddle buddies.
customer_reviews.text: This is possibly the most unnecessary thing I've ever bought. I also love it, so there's that. Kylo Ren is perfect hugging size at about 2 feet tall, and super soft (well, on the outside). He's cuddled through a few Star Wars watches and spends most of his time sitting on my couch chilling with the throw pillows, but he doesn't eat my food, doesn't whine or throw tantrums nearly as much as his on-screen version, and no one's been stabbed yet, so it's all good. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dea

customer_reviews.title: Kyle!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this guy!! He is super plush and very cuddly. Surprisingly he is a pretty good size. I thought he was gonna be small.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE HIM! Well made, fairly large and super squishy
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Kylo Ren Pillowbuddy
customer_reviews.text: The Kylo Ren plushie is big, soft, and pretty sturdy. Absolutely love him. :)
customer_reviews.author: J-Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I love this plush!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice material and made well. Soft, but firm to lay your head on. He is a nice size too, but not so big that he takes up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Roth

customer_reviews.title: A great plush!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best plush I own, and I own a lot of plushies. He's big, soft, and well made! There's details on his belt and his mask, and it's overall the best plush in my collection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!: )
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected but my son loves him. Very happy!:)
customer_reviews.author: Dallas M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cuddly but not perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, very soft and a great size. Only reason I’m not giving 5 stars is that the print on his face is a little bit cracked, and they shipped it very awkwardly! Still a super cute pillow buddy for less than 15 dollars though.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for confirmation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the sponsor of my daughter for her Confirmation - lol! She loves it - it's pretty big, about the size of an average 2 year old. Very well made, plush and quite dashing. I told my friend it can be her boyfriend, er toyfriend until the real one comes along. Not sure if that was weird or not. Probably was.
customer_reviews.author: Maximum Verbosity

customer_reviews.title: Large sized and super soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love this guy. He’s velvety soft and a great size for a cuddle buddy.I plan on getting the vader next!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Plush fabric and nice details
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god the quality! The fabrics are sooo nice. And he's very tall too! The perfect snuggle buddy.
customer_reviews.author: ROrellana

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Star Wars loving kiddos
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old grandson had the Stormtrooper and loved it so we gave him Kylo for his birthday. He loved it, played with him the entire visit (putting him in time out several times when he used the force incorrectly :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Meredith Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I love him!!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent! I'm a huge Kylo Ren fan -and I'm sure with many who ordered this too- it is worth the money! He is completely soft and extremely huggable :) He's about 24 inches tall, and to give a rough physical estimate I'm a 5'6, 18 yr old female and when I embrace it he's basically the size of my upper chest. It's really neat! I love this plushie and it was really awesome to get it shipped yesterday and surprisngly coming in a day later, that's stellar work! <3
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This plush Kylo is adorable! So mean looking, yet so cuddly! 😂
customer_reviews.author: halcy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but already coming apart at the seams
customer_reviews.text: Love it BUT ordered on Jan 12 and the foot is already coming apart at the seam. I swerved it, if it doesn’t stay I will be sending it back. For $20 I would of thought it would lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: This is made out of some of the softest fabric I've ever felt. Well-made. No tears or loose seams. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: A Surprisingly Good Dog Toy
customer_reviews.text: THE GOODS: My dog loves it more than I do! I was hoping to have it as a decoration of sorts but my puppy got a hold of him and she needs him in order to settle down for a nap. I know this isn't the Kylo Ren Pillowbuddy's purpose but he serves a remarkable dog toy. He has held up well under rough play, slobber, and frequent washes. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Leo Nöel

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with my Kylo 💓
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this came way faster than I thought it would. Second of all, he's so much bigger than I thought. I'm in love with my Kylo 💓
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Collector Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loved it. He added to his collection of Star Wars. Nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Brownie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality and softness are phenomenal. My fiancé thinks it is a little weird but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My sons loves his Kyle Ren pillow! Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: ChristyKosh

customer_reviews.title: kylo's losing his head
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time and it's a really cool product, but the head is barely sewn on; the fluffy stuff on the inside is visible if his head moves a certain way and it feels as though if one weren't careful moving it around, his head would fall right off. I will be attempting to contact amazon about this.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Etzel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than I expected it to be, especially for the price. Huge hit with the birthday boy!!
customer_reviews.author: andrea smith

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got a picture of my nephew hugging it, it's almost as big as he! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Toolkit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size, my son loves this with all his other star wars stuff.
customer_reviews.author: SKirby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kylo Ren plush toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a birthday gift and love it so much (esp for the price) that I had to get another one for our little Kylo Ren fan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pillow buddy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality pillow buddy!!! He is soft, cuddly and made of quality material! A most valuable asset to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came earlier than expected, would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Star Wars Ep7 Kylo Ren Pillow Buddy
product_meta.description: Now you can take either side of the force with you on the go. This kilo Ren pillow buddy is proof of the side you choose. This pillow Buddy is great as a playmate and a bed mate. Perfect for bedtime, sleepovers and just over all fun.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars109 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
